users.title: The Rise of JavaScript
users.content: JavaScript has evolved from a simple scripting language to the backbone of modern web
users.description: A deep dive into the history, growth, and dominance of JavaScript in frontend and backend development
users.author: Sarah Johnson

users.title: Understanding React Hooks
users.content: Hooks like useState and useEffect have transformed the way developers write React components.
users.description: This post explains the basics of React Hooks with examples, making functional components more powerful.
users.author: Michael Brown

users.title: Exploring Node.js
users.content: Node.js enables developers to run JavaScript on the server, opening up full-stack development possibilities.
users.description: Learn about the features, advantages, and use cases of Node.js in building scalable applications.
users.author: Emily Davis

users.title: CSS Tricks for Beginners
users.content: CSS is more than just colors and fonts—it’s about layout, responsiveness, and accessibility
users.description: A beginner-friendly guide to essential CSS techniques that every web developer should know.
users.author: David Lee
